description: Creates a job. A job is a set of instructions that Deadline Cloud uses to schedule and run work on available workers. For more information, see Deadline Cloud jobs.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID of the farm to connect to the job.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The ID of the queue that the job is submitted to.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The unique token which the server uses to recognize retries of the same request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: The priority of the job. The highest priority (first scheduled) is 100. When two jobs have the same priority, the oldest job is scheduled first.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters for the job. (string) --- (dict) --- The details of job parameters. int (string) --- A signed integer represented as a string. float (string) --- A double precision IEEE-754 floating point number represented as a string. string (string) --- A UTF-8 string. path (string) --- A file system path represented as a string.

nested_params.name: int
nested_params.description: A signed integer represented as a string.

nested_params.name: float
nested_params.description: A double precision IEEE-754 floating point number represented as a string.

nested_params.name: path
nested_params.description: A file system path represented as a string.

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: The attachments for the job. Attach files required for the job to run to a render job. A list of manifests which describe job attachment configurations. (dict) --- The details of the manifest that links a job's source information. fileSystemLocationName (string) --- The file system location name. The file's root path. The format of the root path. outputRelativeDirectories (list) --- The file path relative to the directory. (string) --- inputManifestPath (string) --- The file path. inputManifestHash (string) --- The hash value of the file. fileSystem (string) --- The file system.

nested_params.name: manifests
nested_params.description: A list of manifests which describe job attachment configurations.

nested_params.name: rootPathFormat
nested_params.description: The format of the root path.

nested_params.name: outputRelativeDirectories
nested_params.description: The file path relative to the directory.

nested_params.name: inputManifestHash
nested_params.description: The hash value of the file.

parameters.name: maxWorkerCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of worker hosts that can concurrently process a job. When the maxWorkerCount is reached, no more workers will be assigned to process the job, even if the fleets assigned to the job's queue has available workers. You can't set the maxWorkerCount to 0. If you set it to -1, there is no maximum number of workers. If you don't specify the maxWorkerCount, Deadline Cloud won't throttle the number of workers used to process the job.
